Class Board

java.lang.Object
  Board

 class Board
extends java.lang.Object

It provides a blueprint for the the basic and fundamental unit of the game - the Board object. It contains methods co-operatively and implicitly with a Board object.

Version:
( 1.0 [24/12/15] )
Author:
(Mehul Ahal)
See Also:
Ship

Constructor Summary
Board()
          Board Constructor creates a Board Object, the Board[] initialised with ' ' spaces, and with Ships constructed by the Ship constructor.
 
Method Summary
 void display()
          Method display prints a Board in a readable format.
 void makeShips()
          Method makeShips creates legal Ships for the PLAYER, for a given Board, taking inputs.
 boolean shipVal(java.awt.Point point, int direct)
          Method shipVal returns true if a Ship created, can be legally placed on a given Board, or false otherwise (while displaying the error message).
static boolean validate(Board boards, java.lang.String inStr, boolean toCheckIsTried, boolean isDirect)
          Method validate returns true if the input (as a String) is valid for a Board (also along with the Ships' placement), or false otherwise (displayingthe error messages).

Constructor Detail

Board

public Board()
Board Constructor creates a Board Object, the Board[] initialised with ' ' spaces, and with Ships constructed by the Ship constructor.

Method Detail

display

public void display()
Method display prints a Board in a readable format.

makeShips

public void makeShips()
               throws java.lang.Exception
Method makeShips creates legal Ships for the PLAYER, for a given Board, taking inputs. It displays input cues for the benefit of the user.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

shipVal

public boolean shipVal(java.awt.Point point,
                       int direct)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Method shipVal returns true if a Ship created, can be legally placed on a given Board, or false otherwise (while displaying the error message). It displys the relevant input-error messages for the user.

Parameters:
point - A parameter
direct - A parameter
Returns:
The return value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

validate

public static boolean validate(Board boards,
                               java.lang.String inStr,
                               boolean toCheckIsTried,
                               boolean isDirect)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Method validate returns true if the input (as a String) is valid for a Board (also along with the Ships' placement), or false otherwise (displayingthe error messages). It displays relevant input-error messages.

Parameters:
boards - A parameter
inStr - A parameter
toCheckIsTried - A parameter
Returns:
The return value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
